title: The Best Official Ways to Get in Touch with Oprah Winfrey

steps.title: Send fan mail to 300 West 57th Street 11th Floor New York, NY 10019.
steps.content: Send fan mail to 300 West 57th Street 11th Floor New York, NY 10019. If you have a personal story to share or if you’d like to show your appreciation for something that Oprah or her magazine has done, send a letter to Oprah Daily’s address. [1] X Research source You may also be able to request an autograph from Oprah. You can also call the Oprah Daily office by dialing 212-649-2000. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Mail a letter to 1041 N.
steps.content: Mail a letter to 1041 N. Formosa Ave. W. Hollywood, CA 90046. The Oprah Winfrey Network (OWN) is located in California at The Lot at Formosa in Hollywood, California. [3] X Research source If you’d like to send fan mail or otherwise get in contact with Oprah or her team, sending a letter to The Lot’s address may be a good way to do that. You may also be able to call The Lot at 323-850-3180. The Lot is also where other leading entertainment companies like SiriusXM, Showtime, and Ticketmaster are headquartered. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Email owcf_inquiries@harpo.com for any philanthropic requests.
steps.content: Email owcf_inquiries@harpo.com for any philanthropic requests. To ask Oprah for a grant or financial assistance, send an email to the Oprah Winfrey Charitable Foundation . Oprah’s foundation has donated over $400 million to organizations around the world, with a specific focus on youth education. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Submit a program idea to OWN through the Discovery portal.
steps.content: Submit a program idea to OWN through the Discovery portal. If you have a great idea for an unscripted project you’d like to see on the Oprah Winfrey Network and you’re an established television producer or production company, visit Discovery’s Producer’s Portal and fill out the form. [6] X Research source If you’re not affiliated with a production company, you may be able to submit your ideas to Discovery Studios .

steps.title: Comment on one of Winfrey’s Facebook posts.
steps.content: Comment on one of Winfrey’s Facebook posts. Oprah Winfrey is most active on her Facebook account, so the best way to reach her over social media is to comment on one of her posts. Create an account, visit her profile, then click the “Comment” button under any post. Write your message, then hit “Send.” Unlike other platforms, Facebook doesn’t put a limit on the length of your comment, so you can write as much detail as needed to get your story across. Try to make your comment heartfelt and write as much detail as needed to make it stand out from the others.

steps.title: Follow and message Oprah Winfrey on LinkedIn.
steps.content: Follow and message Oprah Winfrey on LinkedIn . Oprah has over a million followers on LinkedIn and regularly posts about her work. Although Winfrey or her team may not reply, it may be worth a shot to message her if no other contact method works. Create a LinkedIn profile , then click “Message” on Winfrey’s profile. Type your message, then hit “Send.” LinkedIn is mainly used for professional purposes. Make sure you fill out your profile so that whoever sees it will know who you are. You can also try to send an invitation to Winfrey to “connect” with you. To do this, click on the “More” button on her profile, then select “Connect.” [7] X Research source

steps.title: Tweet Oprah’s account directly.
steps.content: Tweet Oprah’s account directly. Although Winfrey is less active on Twitter (X) than on LinkedIn or Facebook, she may reply to you if you send her a message that way. Create a free account, then hit “Reply” on one of her tweets or tweet directly at her by including her tag (@Oprah) at the beginning of your message. If you use a hashtag in your tweet and it becomes viral, you may be able to get Winfrey’s attention, especially if your message is meaningful or promotes positive social change.

steps.title: Comment on Oprah Daily’s Instagram posts.
steps.content: Comment on Oprah Daily’s Instagram posts. Winfrey’s main account has her comments turned off. However, you may be able to share your story on Oprah Daily Magazine’s posts. Create a free profile , then comment your message on any of her pictures. If your comment is meaningful or moving in some way, you may get a response from her media team. You can also try commenting on a post made by the Oprah Winfrey Network .

steps.title: Contact Winfrey’s Academy for Girls for admission information.
steps.content: Contact Winfrey’s Academy for Girls for admission information. Although Winfrey’s Leadership Academy for Girls (OWLAG) isn’t a great place to send fan mail or ask for financial assistance, you can contact this organization if you’re interested in supporting the development of future women leaders in South Africa. You can also apply to work at the school . [8] X Research source Phone number: +27 (016) 366-9000 Email: info@owlag.co.za

steps.title: Follow Oprah’s social media for her current speaking engagements.
steps.content: Follow Oprah’s social media for her current speaking engagements. Oprah Winfrey frequently updates her Facebook and Instagram with her latest appearances, speaking engagements, tours, and events. You can also subscribe to Oprah Daily Insider to get invitations to private events and classes with Oprah. [9] X Research source Being an Insider will also give you access to unlimited content from oprahdaily.com, Oprah’s weekly intention videos and reflections, and weekly newsletters. You can also follow Oprah’s page on official ticket distribution companies like Ticketmaster for new events.

steps.title: Raise money for a good cause.
steps.content: Raise money for a good cause. Oprah is renowned for her positive impact on the world, and she frequently interviews changemakers and philanthropists. If you’ve created a charitable organization or raised a lot of money for a cause, Winfrey or the Oprah Winfrey Charitable Foundation (OWCF) may reach out to you to help. [10] X Research source Oprah interviews and interacts with many people who affect positive change in the world. While contacting Oprah may not be the sole reason you do your work, it may be a good bonus.

steps.title: Excel in arts, entertainment, business, or politics.
steps.content: Excel in arts, entertainment, business, or politics. Oprah is known for interviewing many famous people—from poets and authors to athletes, actors, and actresses. [11] X Research source If you’re interested in pursuing a career in film, sports, or writing, or have garnered fortune and made societal change, you have a good chance of being contacted by Oprah. Oprah is famous for her book club, so if you become a famous author, her team may contact you to discuss your work. Oprah not only interviews titans of industry and politicians but sometimes partners up with them to bring about change in the community.

steps.title: Report calls, letters, or emails that claim you won something from Oprah.
steps.content: Report calls, letters, or emails that claim you won something from Oprah. If you receive any contact claiming that you’ve won a sweepstakes, tickets to Oprah’s show, travel tickets, or money, see if there’s contact information listed that you can use to verify that it’s real. If there isn’t, file a complaint with the FBI and email OWN about the scam at legal@own.tv. [12] X Research source Oprah Winfrey’s studio, Harpo Productions, will never sell tickets or travel packages. Harpo will also not ask you to pay to enter a sweepstakes or send you unsolicited checks in the mail. If either happens, it’s definitely a scam. If Harpo sponsors any sweepstakes, it will be featured on Oprah.com . If you get any notification that you won a sweepstakes, check their website to see if it’s real.

steps.title: Try not to send money, gift cards, or debit cards to celebrities online.
steps.content: Try not to send money, gift cards, or debit cards to celebrities online. Some scammers pretend to be celebrities and reach out to you on social media. If a celebrity messages you asking to send them money for any reason, it’s probably a scam. [13] X Trustworthy Source Federal Trade Commission Website with up-to-date information for consumers from the Federal Trade Commisson Go to source Before replying to a celebrity’s message, click on their account and make sure they have a lot of posts on their feed and a reasonable amount of followers. [14] X Research source For example, a real Oprah Winfrey account will have thousands of posts and millions of followers. If you do receive a message from a fake celebrity account, report it to the Federal Trade Commission and the social media site ( Instagram , X , or Facebook , for example).
